data.text: Yad gos anɨgɨl nepin, nɨbi yaw agɨnɨmɨb, yad sawl takaw tek sɨkol ogɨnap agɨnɨgebin. Yɨp yaw agɨnɨmɨb akaŋ?

11.2 Hos 2.19-20, 1 Ko 4.15, Gal 4.17-18, Epe 5.26-27, Kol 1.28 God ne binɨb yad mɨdupsek muk yɨp okok nep yenɨgel agɨl, gos kɨles gɨl nɨgup. Adek nokom anɨb ak nep, yad nɨbi Klays nop kɨdek gɨnɨmɨb agɨl, gos kɨles gɨl nepin. Nɨbop bin pɨlaj gach ma mɨdɨl suŋtep nep mɨdeb tek mɨdɨl, bɨ nokom dɨnɨg gek, dam bɨ anɨb ak nop ñɨnɨm. Bɨ anɨb ak nɨm Klays.

11.3 Stt 3.1-5, 3.13, Jon 8.44, Hib 13.9, 2 Pi 3.17 Yad pen pɨlɨkebin. Bɨlel yoy yepɨs gep ak, ne Yip nop yepɨs agek nɨg dak tek, nɨbop abe gɨnɨmuŋ tek lɨnɨgab. Bɨ ogɨnap nɨbop abe takaw yepɨs okok ag dad amel, gos tɨmel kɨli nepal tek nɨŋɨd, Klays nop nokom gos nɨŋɨd gach ma mɨdɨl suŋtep nep mɨdebɨm ak kelɨgɨnɨmɨb tek lɨnɨgab. Anɨb ak tek yad pɨlɨkebin.

11.4 Gal 1.7-9 Yad nepin, bɨ ogɨnap, kɨli Jisas chɨn ak nop takaw agñɨbun ak ma apal, Jisas olap ke tek takaw ak agñɨbal. Takaw agñɨbal anɨb ak, nɨbi nɨgɨnɨg mɨdebɨm. Pen God Kawnan ak ned dɨpɨm ak mel, kawnan olap ke tek dɨnɨg mɨdebɨm. Pen takaw teplep ak ned gos nepɨm ak mel, takaw teplep olap ke tek gos nɨgɨnɨg mɨdebɨm. Bɨ anɨb okok takaw kɨli pel nepɨm ak nɨm, takaw yad ak abe nɨgɨnɨmɨb.
Nɨgɨm. Nɨbi bɨ ogɨnap kɨlop nɨŋɨd anɨb apɨm, Kɨli bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb bɨawl yɨbɨl okok mɨdebal apɨm. Yad pen bɨ tam okok tek ma mɨdebin agɨl gos nepin. Mel yɨbɨl.

11.6 1 Ko 1.17, 2.1, 2.13, 2 Ko 4.2, 10.10, Epe 3.4 Yad takaw agñɨtep ma gɨpin tek lup, ak tap yokɨp tek lup. Gos yad ak pen wulep ma yowup. Mɨnek mɨnek tap tɨtay dɨl yad gɨpin ak nɨbop yomub, yad bɨ gos nɨgep yɨbɨl mɨdebin.
Yad nɨbop God takaw teplep agñɨnek ak pen, nɨbi tap ogɨnap pen yɨp lɨ ñɨnɨmɨb agɨl ma agɨnek. Gɨnek anɨb ak, nɨbop dad aplanenɨm agɨl, yɨb yad ap yownɨmuŋ. Tap gɨpin anɨb ak, tap tɨmel gɨpin akaŋ?
Yad nɨb ayɨp mɨdɨl nɨbop gɨñɨnek won ak, binɨb Klays yɨl wakay ogɨnap mɨdebal yɨp mani tap okok ñel wog anɨb ak gɨnek. Yad anɨgɨl, ak mani tap kɨli si dɨnek tek.

11.9 2 Ko 12.13, Plp 4.15-18, 1 Te 2.9 Nɨb ayɨp yenek ñɨn ak, yɨp tap olap tek dek, yad pen bɨ nɨbop olap mani tap okok yɨp ñaŋ agɨl ma agnɨgɨnek. Mel. Klays binɨb ne Masedoniya plopens nɨb owlak okok nep, tap tay yɨp tek dak okok dap ñɨlak. Tap nɨbop olap dɨnɨg nebneb ma agɨnek, kɨdek abe tap nɨbop ogɨnap ma agnɨgɨnɨgayn.

11.10 1 Ko 9.15 Nɨbi Akaya plopens mɨdebɨm okok, tap nɨbop ma dɨpin tek, agɨlɨg yɨbɨl yenɨgayn. Yad gɨpin anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, yɨb yad ak dad aplanin agɨl gos nepin ak, bɨ olap kanɨb yɨp anɨb ak ma kamnɨgab. Klays bɨne mɨdebin tek, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin.
Pen takaw apin anɨb ak, nɨbop yɨlɨk nɨŋɨd ma agebin. God ne nɨgup, yad nɨbop mapen yɨbɨl lɨpin.

Pen bɨ ogɨnap yɨb kɨli ke dad aplanun agɨl, kanɨb ak pɨyow nepal. Pɨyow nɨgɨlɨg chɨnop nɨŋɨd, Pol bɨne okok kɨli mɨdebal tek chɨn anɨb ak nep mɨdobun agɨnɨgel agɨl, gos ak nepal. Yad pen anɨgɨl kanɨb kɨlop gɨñen, kɨli Pol gup tek gɨpun agɨl, agɨnɨgel tek ma lɨnɨgab. Yad anɨgɨl kanɨb gɨñɨlɨg nep yenɨgayn.

11.13 Lom 16.18, 2 Ko 2.17, Gal 1.7, Plp 3.2, 2 Pi 2.1, Lep 2.2 Bɨ anɨb okok, kɨli bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb yepɨs mɨdebal okok, Jisas wog gobun agɨl yepɨs gɨpal. Kɨli gos anɨgɨl nepal. Binɨb ogɨnap kɨli chɨnop nɨŋɨd, bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb okok mɨdobun gos ak nɨgɨnɨgel agɨl, gos anɨb ak nepal. Anɨgɨl nɨŋɨd, sɨlok lɨl bɨ anɨb ak ke mɨdebal.
11.14 Gal 1.8 Pen anɨgebal ak, judɨl gos pal ma lɨnɨmɨb. Chɨn nopun, Satan abe sɨlok lɨl anɨb ak ke mɨdɨl, ensel mɨlek sek tek sɨlok lɨl mɨdeb.

11.15 2 Ko 3.9, Plp 3.19 Anɨb ak Satan bɨ wog gɨñeb ne okok, kɨli bɨ suŋtep wog gɨñeb tek sɨlok lɨl mɨdebal ak, gos awl ma nɨgɨnɨgun. Pen gɨpal anɨb ak, kɨdek tap tɨtay dɨl gɨpal okok God kɨlop pen gɨnɨgab.

Yad tepayaŋ agebin, nɨbi yɨp bɨ sawl sek agɨl, gos ak ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Pen yɨp bɨ sawl sek agɨl gos nɨgɨnɨgabɨm ak, abe tep mɨdeb. Yɨp pen kelɨgem, bɨ sawl okok yɨb kɨli ke dad aplanɨbal tek takaw ogɨnap agɨnɨm.
Takaw anɨb awl, Bɨawl ak yɨp gos ñub tek ma agɨnɨgebin. Bɨ sawl okok, yɨb kɨli ke dad aplanɨbal tek agɨnɨgebin.
Bɨ kuŋay gos lum awl nɨŋɨd, yɨb kɨli ke dad aplanɨbal. Anɨb ak tek yad abe gɨlɨg, yɨb yad ke dad aplanɨgebin.
Taynen anɨb apin? Nɨbi bɨ gos nɨgep okok nɨgtep yɨbɨl gɨpɨm tek, bɨ sawl sek okok takaw sawl agel, nɨbop yɨlɨk ma gek nɨgun agɨl gos nepɨm.

Nɨŋɨd apin, bɨ olap nɨbop kodɨl nag lup tek lɨl akaŋ, tap nɨbi okok mɨdupsek dɨjuwɨl akaŋ, nɨbop yepɨs agɨl muk ne okok lɨl akaŋ, ne ke gek bɨawl yɨb mɨdeb ak mɨdɨl akaŋ, nɨbop takaw tɨmel agɨl nebeŋ agɨl akaŋ, tap tɨmel anɨb okok anɨgenɨgab, nop kelɨgem, gos ne okok ke gɨnɨmuŋ.
11.21 Plp 3.5 Chɨn kɨmɨgel mɨdɨl, tap anɨb okok pen nɨbop ma gɨpun. Chɨn anɨgɨl gɨ tɨmel gon, chɨnop nebeŋ gɨnɨmuŋ akaŋ?
Kɨli Hiblu bɨ okok akaŋ? Yad abe Hiblu bɨ olap. Kɨli Yislel bɨ okok akaŋ? Yad abe Yislel bɨ olap. Kɨli Eblaham jɨj ne bɨ okok akaŋ? Yad abe Eblaham jɨj ne olap.

11.23 Apo 16.23, 1 Ko 15.10 Kɨli Klays bɨ wog gɨñeb ne okok akaŋ? Yad Klays bɨ wog gɨñeb ne teplep yɨbɨl olap mɨdebin. Yad mɨñɨl bɨ sawl sek takaw sawl yɨbɨl agup tek agebin. Yad wog kɨles gɨl, mɨŋel adek keke dɨpin, bɨ anɨb okok wog sɨkol gɨl, mɨŋel sɨkol dɨpal. Bɨ ogɨnap yɨp ñɨn kuŋay yɨbɨl nag lɨpal, bɨ anɨb okok kɨlop ñɨn nokom nokom nag lɨpal. Bɨ ogɨnap yɨp kɨles tɨmel gɨl yɨbɨl tapɨn pakɨlak, bɨ anɨb okok kɨlop sɨkol yɨbɨl pakɨlak. Ñɨn kuŋay yɨbɨl kumdam nab lɨl ownek.
11.24 Lo 25.3 Bɨ Juda kɨli ñɨn nokom nag dɨl yɨp pakɨlak, anep 39 ak. Ñɨn keke anep mamɨd ak yɨp anɨgɨl pakɨlak.

11.25 Apo 14.19, 16.22, 27.41 Ñɨn keke omɨŋal nokom ak, bɨ ogɨnap kul dɨl yɨp pakɨlak. Ñɨn olap binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl yɨp kab ju pakɨlak. Sip ajenek, ñɨn keke omɨŋal nokom, sip ak pɨsnep pag pakek amdak. Sip tɨmel gak ñɨn anɨb okok, mɨnek olap ñɨg wɨj adek ak aplan apyan gɨ mɨden mɨden, sub saŋɨd amɨl, kɨsɨlɨm apɨl, man tɨkak.

11.26 Apo 9.23, 13.50, 14.15, 20.3, 23.10-11 Ñɨn kuŋay kanɨb nab okok ajelɨgɨpin. Ajɨlɨg, ñɨg nab okok kumeb tek yelɨgɨpin. Bɨ binɨb paklɨl tap kɨlop si dɨpal nab okok kumeb tek yelɨgɨpin. Binɨb yad yɨpɨd gɨl akaŋ, binɨb Juda mel nab okok kumeb tek yelɨgɨpin. Tawn nab okok akaŋ, man nep binɨb ma yelak nab okok akaŋ, solwala nab okok kumeb tek yelɨgɨpin. Binɨb chɨn Klays yɨl mɨdobun apal ak pen, Klays yɨl ma mɨdebal nab okok kumeb tek yelɨgɨpin.

11.27 Apo 20.31, 1 Ko 4.11, 2 Ko 6.5 Wog kɨles gɨl koslam yɨbɨl gelɨgɨpin. Ñɨn kuŋay wɨsɨn ma kɨnelɨgɨpin. Ñɨn kuŋay tap mɨdup ma yek yuwan awl gɨlɨg, ñɨg nen golɨgup. Ñɨn ogɨnap chech ma mɨdɨl, yɨgen nep gelɨgɨpin.

11.28 Apo 20.18-21, 20.31 Yad mɨŋel awl ogɨnap sek yɨp owup ak, anɨb ak agɨnɨm ak pen, mɨŋel olap nɨm gos nepin. Yad binɨb Klays yɨl mɨdebal man keke okok kod mɨdtep gin agɨl, mɨdtep gebal akaŋ gos awl ak nepin.
11.29 1 Ko 8.13, 9.22 Kɨli olap kɨles ma mɨdeb, yad abe kɨles ma mɨdeb tek lup. Pen gos olap apek kɨli olap tap si tap tɨmel gep tek lonɨmuŋ, nɨgen yɨp mɨŋel gek mɨlɨk yɨbɨl yowup.
Yad yɨb yad ak ke dad aplanɨl nɨm, tap yad ke kɨles ak ma mɨdeb tek yomnɨgab ak, anɨb okok gos nɨgɨnɨgayn. Anɨb ak tap yad okok dad aplanɨgayn ak, kɨles mel.
11.31 2 Ko 1.23 God, ne Bɨawl chɨn Jisas Klays nop God ne mɨdeb, Nap ne mɨdeb. Chɨn yɨb nop pel pelnep dad aplanɨgun. God anɨb ak, ne yad yepɨs ma agebin ak nɨgup.

11.32-33 Apo 9.23-25 Yad taun Damaskus yenek, gapman bɨnonɨm Aledas bɨne aglek Damaskus kodolɨgup ak, ne yɨp nag lin agɨl, bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep ne okok agek, kɨli am taun kab wali palawl ak, kanɨbtam okok mɨdupsek keke kod yelak.
Anɨgɨlak ak pen, bɨ chɨn ogɨnap yɨp dɨl wad awl mɨgan ak yɨgɨl, nag tun gɨl, kab wali palawl ak bɨbejɨl mɨgan ak lɨpɨg seŋayaŋ yokel, am am ayaŋ pakɨl, pɨlɨk amnɨnek.
